attributes.review: I am throughout outraged at this app. I would like to begin by explaining I take pride in being called a Karen and I will always stand for what is right. But this app isn’t it. Not only did it take weeks to download, but it made my phone crash. Now, I am considering buying a new one. Nothing is worth that. Moreover, this app caused my other apps to stop working and took all of my storage. I was bombarded with adds to the point that it was difficult to even read comments. I deserve a refund for the time and energy I put into using this app. Seriously do better this is revolting and embarrassing.
attributes.title: Disappointed and Outraged
